title: Sri Lanka to pay local pharma suppliers at current dollar rate: Minister
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka will settle pharmaceuticals suppliers who have invoiced the government in rupees at the exchange rate prevailing at the time the shipment is cleared, Health Minister Channa Jayasumana said.
“Two weeks ago I submitted a cabinet paper to pay them the exchange rate at the time of clearing,” Minister Jayasumana said.
Pharmaceutical firms who had invoiced in US dollars had been badly hit after the rupee fell sharply following two years of money printing. (Colombo/May06/2022)
